value.summary: All six JSON outputs are numerically consistent with the report data and equations, with no fabricated quantities. Each solution applies the correct relationships (dilution, stoichiometry with purity, titration stoichiometry, bond-enthalpy estimate, Faraday’s law electrolysis, and Kc from equilibrium concentrations) and produces correct final values to sensible significant figures. Line references point to relevant numbered lines in the report and are valid. Minor phrasing issues (e.g., P04’s “m
